definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: Tom seems rather mean, but he has a kind heart.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆看上去挺小气，但心地善良。

sentences.english: He is a kind and efficient man.
sentences.chinese: 王总是一个心地善良，很讲效率的人。

sentences.english: She had a good heart, a beautiful face, and a golden star on her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她心地善良，美丽可爱，额头上还有一颗金色的星星。

sentences.english: They are soft, good-natured, and easy-going.
sentences.chinese: 他们性情温柔，心地善良，宽容随和。

sentences.english: I'm not good-looking, but I am very nice, attractive and athletic.
sentences.chinese: 我长的不帅，但我心地善良，有吸引力，运动型男。

sentences.english: Most women prefer husbands with big hearts.
sentences.chinese: 多半女人喜欢心地善良令人窝心的老公。
杰克逊是心地善良的人。

sentences.english: No body knows (that) the ugly man is kind-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 没有人知道那个样貌极丑的男子心地善良。

sentences.english: We must make friends with those who have good character and kindness of heart.
sentences.chinese: 我们必需和往往具有精采风致和心地善良的人交伴侣。

sentences.english: She was so kind that she came to administer the medicine to the lonely old sick woman every day.
sentences.chinese: 她心地善良，每天都来帮这位患病的孤寡老人服药。

sentences.english: Although short-tempered, he is a good person who is full of kindness.
sentences.chinese: 他性格急暴但心地善良，是个大好人。

sentences.english: Du Xiaomei is a countryside girl, the good-hearted appearance is delicate and pretty.
sentences.chinese: 杜小梅是农村的一个姑娘，心地善良长相俊美。

sentences.english: There was a poor farmer in the country. He had a wife with a warm heart.
sentences.chinese: 在乡下有个贫穷的农夫，他有个心地善良的妻子。

sentences.english: Her late husband was a kind-hearted and friendly man.
sentences.chinese: 她已故的丈夫是个心地善良又仁慈的人。

sentences.english: He is so kind-hearted. I hope we are good friends for ever.
sentences.chinese: 他心地善良，我希望我们永远是好朋友。

sentences.english: Kind-hearted, honest, with good team-work spirit.
sentences.chinese: 心地善良，为人诚实，具有良好的团队合作精神。

definition: to be good at understanding others (idiom)
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
see 通情達理|通情达理[tong1 qing2 da2 li3]
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
to make a clear difference between what one likes and what one hates/to have well-defined likes and dislikes
